explains: n. 踢悬空球；平底船；下赌注者
vt. 推掉工作；踢悬空球
vi. 弃踢；撒手不干；乘方头平底船；下赌注

sentences.en: The investment is little more than a punt.
sentences.cn: 这项投资无异于一场赌博。

sentences.en: The referee told him to punt or kick the ball off the ground.
sentences.cn: 裁判让他开悬空球，将球踢出场地。

sentences.en: He caught a punt and scored the winning touchdown, with a minute left to play.
sentences.cn: 他将开出的悬空球接住，在比赛还剩一分钟时成功达阵得分。
